summary: Discussion focused on project hours status and next steps, with Michael updating on COO hiring process. Currently at 86 hours used out of 90 quarterly hours, with possibility to go over by 45 hours at same rate. Michael is conducting COO interviews while managing multiple urgent priorities.
decisions: Will take a week to get organized before making next steps on resourcing
OK to continue work and go over hours if needed

commitments: Laura will review the Conga issue
